message:
Make Guidance interface more approachable.

- Guidance#getInput() now returns an input stream rather than a File.
- Renames AFLRedundancyGuidance to AFLPerformanceGuidance.
- Improves public API documentation by a lot.
- Cleans up several mistakes.

added: Guidance guidance = new AFLPerformanceGuidance(testInputFile, a2jPipe, j2aPipe);
deleted: Guidance guidance = new AFLRedundancyGuidance(testInputFile, a2jPipe, j2aPipe);
